name: Hashflow
description: Hashflow is a multichain decentralized exchange (DEX) that enables users to trade digital assets on leading blockchains including Ethereum, Arbitrum, Avalanche, BNB Chain, Optimism, Polygon, and Solana in just a matter of seconds. Hashflow leverages an intent-based smart order routing architecture to offer traders the best prices, access to over $8B in liquidity, and the ability to trade every token. Since launching in April 2021, Hashflow has facilitated over $18B in total trade volume, making it a top 10 DEX.
